insert into board_table(board_seq, fk_category_num, subject, content, readCnt, regDate, fk_employee_seq, status, commentCnt) values(#{board_seq}, #{fk_category_num}, #{subject}, #{content}, default, default, #{fk_employee_seq}, default, default)

mapper.select: select B.board_seq, E.employee_name, B.subject, B.content, B.readCnt, to_char(B.regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS regDate, B.commentCnt, B.fk_employee_seq from board_table B join employees_table E on B.fk_employee_seq = E.employee_seq where fk_category_num = 3 order by B.board_seq desc

select previousseq, previoussubject , board_seq, fk_employee_seq, E.employee_name, subject, content, readCnt, regDate , nextseq, nextsubject from ( select previousseq, previoussubject , board_seq, fk_employee_seq, subject, content, readCnt, regDate , nextseq, nextsubject from ( select lag(board_seq, 1) over(order by board_seq desc) AS previousseq , lag(subject, 1) over(order by board_seq desc) AS previoussubject
, board_seq, fk_employee_seq, subject, content, readCnt , to_char(regDate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS regDate
, lead(board_seq, 1) over(order by board_seq desc) AS nextseq , lead(subject, 1) over(order by board_seq desc) AS nextsubject from board_table where fk_category_num = 3 ) V where V.board_seq = #{board_seq} ) T join employees_table E on T.fk_employee_seq = employee_seq
mapper.update: update board_table set readCnt = readCnt + 1 where board_seq = #{board_seq}
update board_table set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, regDate = sysdate where board_seq = #{board_seq}
